xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/180960-Celestial Wives of the Meadow Mari 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qFQlUhjLDt8o3onGsptvUDKABc0.jpg This is a collection of portraits: 23 short stories about the Marij women, a sort of Decameron suspended between magic and realism, in which the Autonomous Republic of the Marij El serves as a backdrop for the collective history of a people of ancient tradition. A journey into a mysterious and unknown part of the world. Celestial Wives of the Meadow Mari
